item.title: Epson introduces a small, portable printer for mobile use
item.description:
Source: Epson. The WF-100 is designed for professionals on-the-go. Epson, a company that provides digital imaging and printing solutions, has introduced the Epson WorkForce WF-100. This printer is one of the smallest and lightest mobile printers globally. Its compact design caters to professionals who are frequently on the move. It features a built-in battery that can be recharged via USB and integrated wireless capabilities for easy printing while traveling...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/epson-introduces-a-small-portable-printer-for-mobile-use/

item.title: Fujifilm has launched the X100T premium compact camera in the Middle East
item.description:
Fujifilm has introduced the X100T, a high-end compact camera succeeding the successful X100S, to the Middle East market. Source: Fujifilm. The X100T is available in black and silver. “The X100, launched in March 2011, established a new market for premium compact cameras. A year later, the second-generation X100S was released, featuring an updated sensor, processor, and an advanced Hybrid Viewfinder,” stated Yuta Kawamura, Marketing Manager for the electronic imaging division at Fujifilm Middle East & Africa...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fujifilm-has-launched-the-x100t-premium-compact-camera-in-the-middle-east/

item.title: Canon Middle East introduces new cameras for 2015, challenging the competition
item.description:
Canon Middle East’s 2015 camera lineup boasts the high quality and advanced technology expected from the brand, with the added convenience of single-tap sharing via NFC and Wi-Fi. The compact PowerShot series includes the SX530 HS, featuring a 50x zoom lens, and the SX410 IS, equipped with a 40x optical zoom. Here’s a closer look at the PowerShot SX530 HS: 50x zoom Wi-Fi with NFC Full HD video recording Creative modes and manual controls The PowerShot SX410 IS offers these notable features:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/canon-middle-east-introduces-new-cameras-for-2015-challenging-the-competition/
